Projects

Hardware-based game assistant

market on shopee

To help loyal players easily spawn monsters and install software scripts that do not violate official regulations, this hardware-oriented game assistant is designed. There are currently more than 100 users.

Co-designed and sold products with the seniors of the school team.

CeranaPOS

webpage under development

The continuation of the DBMS course project will be launched at the Christmas market. CeranaPOS is a simple, convenient and fast online POS service. Do you set up a stall in a small market or do some short-term transactions, but find that the invoicing system on the market is expensive and there is no need to customize it? Purchase, sales, profit management, employee management, all you need is a laptop or tablet to easily meet your needs!

Trying to introduce full Firebase for backend and Github action for CI in this project.

Fencing scoring machine

slide

It is not necessary to get an expensive electronic scoring device from the school club every time I practice.

Together with my classmates, use Arduino and 3D printing to design a very low-cost electronic review device.
